name: Here Be Dragons: A Text Based Adventure
name_original: Here Be Dragons: A Text Based Adventure
description: Hi This is my first game! I wanted to try my hands and twine and this is the result! ALL criticism is needed so be honest with me! I hope you enjoy the story! There is a weird little error that pops up, ignore that the game runs as it should. I am looking through the code i used to find where the issue is it will be fixed.
